ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Autonomous crafting I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start to learn how to program machines to be able to perform skilled labor.
ResearchProjectDef.discoveredLetterText:
With this Research you have unlocked S.A.L automation robots.
Theese are a placeable robots you place on a workbench workercell, then they will start doing work on that bench.

This is added as a Tribute to S.A.L mod which where what Project RimFactory started as before it became assemblers as we know them today in PRF.
Settings and most things are taken directly from S.A.L mod but might be changed/tweaked later. Also it does not include miner, be feel free to ask if you think we miss them.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L autonomous crafting II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start to learn how to program more advanced machines to be able to craft faster, better, and more accurately.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L. Specialisation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Start to learn how to specialise and create different auto-assemblers with different roles.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Art I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn the ways of hypercomputing and neural networks, allowing machines to create proper semi-decent art.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Art II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Combined with overclocking, make your neural networks react much faster, improving quality of art.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L autonomous cooking
ResearchProjectDef.description: Learn how to give auto-assemblers enough dexterity and precision for them to become cooks.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Autonomous overclocking I
ResearchProjectDef.description: S.A.L. machines often work too slowly for repetitive tasks where quality doesn't matter. Learn how to speed them up at the cost of quality.

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Autonomous overclocking II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Increases to servo speed and internal visualisation computers allow this S.A.L crafter to work even faster than before

ResearchProjectDef.label: S.A.L Godly Crafting
ResearchProjectDef.description: A godlike crafter made with insane amounts of materials, you may run out of resources before you can turn this crafter off, this might be on edge to insanity, is this even safe?!
